entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing early this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h late this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High zero with temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High zero with temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
